MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the SY18 postcode area of Llanidloes, affecting properties in Gorn Road and surrounding streets. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:00PM due to faulty equipment on the underground cable network and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of complex repairs and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2am on 25th April
